app.title: Who's a Wolf ?
app.intro:
You've been sent to gather statements from the last villagers of Howlmore Town after a series of werewolf attacks. One or more are lying because they are secretly werewolves. One other villager, you were told, is a shill paid by the werewolves to lie.

Can you find who's a werewolf, who's an honest villager, and who is the lying shill?
